alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 20 at 2:23AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible, mainly above 7000 feet. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and adjacent foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel may become difficult due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
